mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ft_area_id AS "ftAreaId", a.ft_area_bId AS "ftAreaBid", a.ft_area_name AS "ftAreaName", a.level AS "level", a.tyfo_area_id AS "tyfoAreaId", a.tyfo_area_bId AS "tyfoAreaBid", a.tyfo_area_name AS "tyfoAreaName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO area( ft_area_id, ft_area_bId, ft_area_name, level, tyfo_area_id, tyfo_area_bId, tyfo_area_name, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{ftAreaId}, #{ftAreaBid}, #{ftAreaName}, #{level}, #{tyfoAreaId}, #{tyfoAreaBid}, #{tyfoAreaName}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE area SET ft_area_id = #{ftAreaId}, ft_area_bId = #{ftAreaBid}, ft_area_name = #{ftAreaName}, level = #{level}, tyfo_area_id = #{tyfoAreaId}, tyfo_area_bId = #{tyfoAreaBid}, tyfo_area_name = #{tyfoAreaName}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
